title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your own diversions and pleasures appear to be more of a priority today than laboring for someone else. However, your self-absorption isnt necessarily coming from a selfish place. Todays pleasure-conscious Libra New Moon in your 5th House of Fun prompts you to tap into your inner child to find inspiration and excitement again. Starting with your curious delights is good practice for how you might encourage others to appreciate the beauty in the world around them. Novelist Ray Bradbury wrote, Stuff your eyes with wonder. It's more fantastic than any dream made or paid for in factories. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
